Package com.view.component

Class DragAndDrop

java.lang.Object
com.view.component.DragAndDrop
public class DragAndDrop
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains everything to create drag and drop functionalities and assign them to components.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.function.Predicate<java.awt.Component> allowDragAndDrop
    The condition to allow the component to be dragged and dropped.

    private java.util.function.Consumer<java.awt.Rectangle> onDrag
    The action called when the component is dragged.
